alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 630 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rocky Point to Farmingville. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rocky Point around 550 PM EDT. Medford around 555 PM EDT. Middle Island around 605 PM EDT. Yaphank around 610 PM EDT. Manorville and Wading River around 630 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk
